span.span: ​3232 NW 65th St, Oklahoma City, OK 73116 Phone: 767-3000 Fax: 767-3007 Cafeteria: 607-3652
Breakfast: 7:15 to 7:35 a.m. School Day: 7:40 a.m. to 3:00 p.m.
​The following information was emailed to ICMS families from Susan Linderer, ICMS School Counselor:
​ Student Support - Virtual and Distance SEL

span.a: Student Support - Talking to Students About Coronavirus

a.span: Vaccines Required to Attend School in Oklahoma
Vacunas Requeridas para Asistir a La Escuela en OK

span.style: font-size: 28px; font-family: "times new roman", times, serif;
font-size: 28px; font-family: "times new roman", times, serif;

span.span: ​The following documents were emailed to ICMS families: the Frequently Asked Questions document; the Acceptable Use Policy which every student and family agreed to at the beginning of the school year; an instruction page for how students will use Google Meet; and an instruction page for students to use Google Chat. Please note that this plan is fluid and is subject to changes and tweaks as needed. We will keep you updated via email and robo-calls when deemed necessary. Please be patient with us as we navigate this uncharted territory.
to report bullying and school safety concerns.

strong.span: Distance Learning Plan for Completion of the 2019-2020 School Year

span.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 205); font-family: "times new roman", times, serif; background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);

span.font: to see the entire letter from Mrs. Rumbaugh.

span.span: ICMS celebrated with students and staff to share the good news about our state report card. We went from a C to a B overall. BUT....the BEST part of it all is that in the category of student growth we went from a D to a B!!!! So proud of our teachers and students and all of their hard work!
to see more details about our grade on the report.

body.script: require(['jquery', 'common/cookiemanager/cookiemanager', 'designer/iebackground/iebackground'], function ($, cookieManager, bg) { if (cookieManager.getCookie("WSB.ForceDesktop")) { $('.view-as-mobile', '.wsb-canvas-page-container').show().find('a').bind('click', function () { cookieManager.eraseCookie("WSB.ForceDesktop"); window.location.reload(true); }); } bg.fixBackground(); });
